actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO APS_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_PERSON_DETAILS
  (OID,
CUSTOMER_OID,
CUSTOMER_ID,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ENTITY_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TYPE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_IS_AUTH_SIGN,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_OTHERS_INFO,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PARTNER_PERC,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FIRSTNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_MIDDLENAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_LASTNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_FATHERNAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GENDER,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DOB,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_NATIONALITY,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_RES_TAX_PURPOSE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GOVT_ID,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_TAX_ID,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_NO,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_PASSPORT_EXPIRE_DATE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_DESIGNATION,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_HOLD_PERC,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_IS_POLITICALEXPOPER,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_IS_MINOR,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GUARDIAN_NAME,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_UBO_GUARDIAN_RELATIONSHIP,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_COUNTRY,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE1,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_LINE2,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_CITY,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_DISTRICT,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_STATE,
CUSTOMER_KEY_PERSON_ADDRESS_ZIP
)
VALUES
  (
    {{this.params.personOID}},
    {{appsmith.store.customerOID}},		
    {{appsmith.store.customerID}},
    {{'UBO Individual Person'}},	
    {{''}},
    {{false}},
    {{''}},
    {{Number(0).toString()}},
    {{Input1.text}},	
    {{Input3.text}},
    {{Input4.text}},
    {{Input5.text}},
    {{Select4.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
    {{Select3.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{Select5.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{Input18.text}},
    {{Input7.text}},
    {{Input19.text}},
    {{moment(DatePicker1).format("YYYY-MM-DD")}},
    {{Input20.text}},
    {{Number(Input22.text).toString()}},
    {{Checkbox1.isChecked}},
    {{vayUboMinorFlag.isChecked}},	
    {{Input21.text}},
    {{Input8.text}},
    {{vayIndUboAddCountrySelect.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{Input9.text}},
    {{Input10.text}},
    {{Input11.text}},
    {{Input12.text}},
    {{Input13.text}},
    {{Input15.text}}
);
